desc: Shen Zhen Yage Technology Co., Ltd registered the brand "YIERYI" in 2016, The main products are: PH meter, Tds ec meter, Do meter, Orp meter, soil meter, refractometer. Our products are widely used in: aquariums, hydroponics , aquaculture, environmental protection, swimming pools, beauty salons, sewage treatment, water

layout.text: Digital PH/EC/TDS/ORP Meter For Swimming pool
